short_summary: Acquisition and delivery of personal protective equipment against fuels and flammable products for DND Bagotville
description: Department of National Defense is issuing this Request for Proposals (RFP) for the purchase of Personal Protective Equipment against fuels and other flammable liquids for the entire supply section of the 3rd Mission Support Squadron (3 ESM) Full details of the requirement can be found in the solicitation, as detailed in Section 7.
